Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameInterface, Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements GameInterface
The Game class contains the main logic of the game Eriantys with the necessary methods for the handling of its phases, initialization and winners determination included
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int numPlayers, String nicknameFirstPlayer, boolean expertModeEnabled)
    Constructs a new Game setting all the necessary accordingly to the game rules and adds the first Player with the given nickname

    activateCharacterCard(String playerNickname, CharacterID characterID)

    void
    checkInfluence(Island island)
    The method checkInfluence, if the given Island doesn't contain any prohibition card, updates the controlling Player of that Island performing all its consequences and check if a winning condition is met.

    The method sets currCard of the currentPlayer to card if the game phase is correct, the choice is valid and playerNickname is the nickname of the current Player.
    void
    chosenCloud(String playerNickname, int cloudIndex)
    The method chosenCloud, if the choice is valid, adds the students on the Cloud with the given index to the Hall of the current Player
    void
    endTurn(String playerNickname)
    The method endTurn calls InitRound if the current Player is the last one of this round phase, otherwise it instantiates a new Turn for the next Player

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int numPlayers, String nicknameFirstPlayer, boolean expertModeEnabled) throws NumberOfPlayerNotSupportedException
      Constructs a new Game setting all the necessary accordingly to the game rules and adds the first Player with the given nickname
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players of this Game
      nicknameFirstPlayer - the nickname of the first player
      expertModeEnabled - true to create a Game with expert mode, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NumberOfPlayerNotSupportedException - when the given number of players is not supported

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NicknameNotAvailableException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method addPlayer adds a Player to the Game if there isn't already another with the same nickname
      Specified by:
      addPlayer in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname that will be assigned to the new Player
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during initialisation
      NicknameNotAvailableException - when the given nickname is already used by another Player

    • chosenCard

      public void chosenCard(String playerNickname, Card card) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method sets currCard of the currentPlayer to card if the game phase is correct, the choice is valid and playerNickname is the nickname of the current Player. If every Player has chosen a Card the method calls createOrderActionPhase and initActionPhase
      Specified by:
      chosenCard in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that called this method
      card - the chosen Card
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during planning
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when the card choice is not valid

    • getPlayersOrderActionPhase

      public Player[] getPlayersOrderActionPhase()

    • moveStudentToChamber

      public void moveStudentToChamber(String playerNickname, Clan clan) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, WrongTurnPhaseException, NotValidMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method moveStudentToChamber moves a student of the specified Clan from the Hall to the Chamber of the current Player
      Specified by:
      moveStudentToChamber in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      clan - the Clan of the student to move
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the student moving phase
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no student of the given clan in the hall of the current Player or the chamber has already the maximum number of students of the given clan

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public void moveStudentToIsland(String playerNickname, Clan clan, int islandIndex) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidIndexException, WrongTurnPhaseException, NotValidMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method moveStudentToChamber moves a student of the specified Clan from the Hall of the current Player to the Island with the specified index
      Specified by:
      moveStudentToIsland in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      clan - the Clan of the student to move
      islandIndex - the index of the Island on which to move the student
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidIndexException - when there is no Island with the given index
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the student moving phase
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no student of the given clan in the hall of the current Player

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(String playerNickname, int islandIndex) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, WrongTurnPhaseException, NotValidIndexException, NotValidMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method moveMotherNature moves Mother Nature on the Island with the specified index, calls checkInfluence and updates the state of the Turn. If it's the last round it calls endTurn
      Specified by:
      moveMotherNature in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      islandIndex - the index of the Island on which to move Mother Nature
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the student moving phase
      NotValidIndexException - when there is no Island with the given index
      NotValidMoveException - when the Island with the given index is too distant to be reached by Mother Nature

    • checkInfluence

      public void checkInfluence(Island island)
      The method checkInfluence, if the given Island doesn't contain any prohibition card, updates the controlling Player of that Island performing all its consequences and check if a winning condition is met. If the Island does contain a prohibition card it is removed and reassigned to the corresponding characterCard
      Parameters:
      island - the Island on which the controlling Player is updated

    • chosenCloud

      public void chosenCloud(String playerNickname, int cloudIndex) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidIndexException, WrongTurnPhaseException, NotValidMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method chosenCloud, if the choice is valid, adds the students on the Cloud with the given index to the Hall of the current Player
      Specified by:
      chosenCloud in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      cloudIndex - the index of the chosen Cloud
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidIndexException - when there is no Cloud with the given index
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the cloud choosing phase
      NotValidMoveException - when the Cloud with the given index has already been picked

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn(String playerNickname) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, WrongTurnPhaseException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method endTurn calls InitRound if the current Player is the last one of this round phase, otherwise it instantiates a new Turn for the next Player
      Specified by:
      endTurn in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the end turn phase

    • activateCharacterCard

      public void activateCharacterCard(String playerNickname, CharacterID characterID) throws ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method activateCharacterCard, if the move is valid, activates the CharacterCard with that CharacterID for the current turn and performs any potential initial effect
      Specified by:
      activateCharacterCard in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      characterID - the CharacterID of the CharacterCard to activate
      Throws:
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when it is called in a not expert game
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when the selected character is not in this game or it is not available, another character card has been activated in this turn or the Player does not have enough coins to pay for it

    • applyCharacterCardEffect

      public void applyCharacterCardEffect(String playerNickname, int islandIndex) throws ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidMoveException, NotValidIndexException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method applyCharacterEffect applies the effect of the CharacterCard currently active on the Island with the specified index
      Specified by:
      applyCharacterCardEffect in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      islandIndex - the index of the Island on which the effect has to be applied
      Throws:
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when it is called in a not expert game
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no activated character card, its effect has already been applied or the move is not valid
      NotValidIndexException - when there is no Island with the given index

    • setClanCharacter

      public void setClanCharacter(String playerNickname, Clan clan) throws ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method setClanCharacter calls the method setCharacterClan on the current Turn, setting a Clan variable necessary for some CharacterCards to perform their effects
      Specified by:
      setClanCharacter in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      clan - the Clan chosen by the Player
      Throws:
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when it is called in a not expert game
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no activated character card, or the Clan for the effect of the character card has already been set

    • applyCharacterCardEffect

      public void applyCharacterCardEffect(String playerNickname, int islandIndex, Map<Clan,Integer> students1, Map<Clan,Integer> students2) throws ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidMoveException
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      The method applyCharacterEffect applies the effect of the CharacterCard currently active with the given parameters
      Specified by:
      applyCharacterCardEffect in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      islandIndex - the index of the destination Island for the students moved (if necessary)
      students1 - the students to move to the destination (if necessary)
      students2 - the students to move from the destination, in case of an exchange of students (if necessary)
      Throws:
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when it is called in a not expert game
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no activated character card, its effect has already been applied or the move is not valid
